关于我们_副标题: With AI we are recreating a variety of medium-to-large productivity tools at low cost. We're experimenting with how solo builders can compete with teams—follow along if that excites you!
🚀 新功能：高级 API 测试功能现已上线: 🚀 New: Advanced API Testing Features Now Available
除协作外可以使用所有功能: Switch to standalone mode for offline use
可随时导出数据到其他工具: Export data to other API tools anytime
所有核心功能永久免费使用: All core features are permanently free
支持HTTP、WebSocket、GraphQL等协议: Supports HTTP, WebSocket, GraphQL and more
在 Vibe Coding 的支持下，个人开发者或小团队同样能够构建媲美企业级应: With Vibe Coding's support, individual developers and small teams can build enterprise-grade applications. Welcome to Star and support us to go further
在同类产品中，Apiflow 也拥有强大的免费功能。: Among similar products, Apiflow also offers powerful free features.
部分竞品仅在付费版本中支持的功能，Apiflow 在免费版中也能体验。: Features that some competitors only offer in paid versions are available in Apiflow's free version.
我们持续追求卓越，致力于打造更好的产品体验。: We continuously pursue excellence and are committed to creating a better product experience.
开发者喜爱的现代化 API 文档与测试工具。轻松构建、测试和记录您的 API。: Modern API documentation and testing tool loved by developers. Build, test, and document your APIs with ease.
Apiflow 是一个开源项目，欢迎社区贡献: Apiflow is an open source project, community contributions welcome
使用文档_简介: Explore key Apiflow workflows, from first run to advanced scenarios.
使用文档_章节_文档结构_描述: Give your team a predictable structure so everyone finds answers quickly.
使用文档_章节_文档结构_要点1: Introduction & context: outline the project goal, audience, and core value.
使用文档_章节_文档结构_要点2: Quick start: show how to create a workspace, import APIs, and make the first call.
使用文档_章节_文档结构_要点3: Deep reference: document endpoints, parameters, sample responses, and error codes.
使用文档_章节_快速开始_描述: Follow these steps to set up the basics in minutes.
使用文档_章节_快速开始_步骤1: Create a project: spin up an environment and invite collaborators.
使用文档_章节_快速开始_步骤2: Sync endpoints: import OpenAPI, Postman collections, or craft requests manually.
使用文档_章节_快速开始_步骤3: Verify flows: run test suites and capture notable changes.
使用文档_章节_深入探索_描述: Keep teams aligned with these capabilities.
使用文档_章节_深入探索_要点1: Collaborative notes: leave context, approvals, and TODOs on endpoints or cases.
使用文档_章节_深入探索_要点2: Versioning: branch per environment and track change history.
使用文档_章节_深入探索_要点3: Automation: combine assertions, scripts, and schedules to protect quality.
使用文档_章节_常见问题_描述: A quick selection of questions teams ask during rollout.
使用文档_章节_常见问题_Q1: How do we share docs with external partners?
使用文档_章节_常见问题_A1: Generate read-only links or export a static site, and guard access with tokens.
使用文档_章节_常见问题_A2: Define variables per environment and toggle the context before sending requests.
使用文档_章节_常见问题_Q3: How do we keep documentation up to date?
使用文档_章节_常见问题_A3: Use auto sync plus change logs to trigger reviews on new updates.
部署教程_简介: Step-by-step instructions to launch Apiflow in your stack.
部署教程_章节_准备工作_描述: Make sure the basics are in place before you begin.
部署教程_章节_准备工作_要点1: Server requirements: >=2 CPU cores, 4 GB RAM, with 80/443 open.
部署教程_章节_准备工作_要点2: Tooling: Docker 24+, Docker Compose, Git, and a Node.js runtime.
部署教程_章节_准备工作_要点3: Domain & TLS: prepare a reachable domain and plan for Let's Encrypt certificates.
部署教程_章节_部署流程_描述: We recommend Docker Compose for the fastest rollout.
部署教程_章节_部署流程_步骤1: Clone the repository and switch to the deployment directory.
部署教程_章节_部署流程_步骤2: Configure variables: copy the env template and fill database or storage values.
部署教程_章节_部署流程_步骤3: Start services: run docker compose up -d and confirm with container logs.
部署教程_章节_运维_描述: Keep the platform stable with these routines.
部署教程_章节_运维_要点1: Backups: export databases and object storage snapshots regularly.
部署教程_章节_运维_要点2: Upgrades: pull new images, validate in staging, then roll out to production.
部署教程_章节_运维_要点3: Monitoring: alert on traffic, response time, and resource usage thresholds.
部署教程_章节_排障_描述: Check these tips first when something goes wrong.
部署教程_章节_排障_要点1: Service unreachable: examine firewalls or proxies and verify port mappings.
部署教程_章节_排障_要点2: API returns 5xx: inspect service logs for database or dependency failures.
部署教程_章节_排障_要点3: Assets missing: refresh CDN caches and rebuild the frontend bundle.
产品展示_描述: Explore highlights of Apiflow's upcoming product experience. Full details coming soon.
注：部分功能因版本不同可能略有差异: Note: Some features may vary slightly depending on the version
基本 HTTP 请求方法支持 (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE,: Basic HTTP Methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, HEAD, OPTIONS)
